attributes.action: Deamalgamate the 1914 amalgamation  of Southern and Northern Nigeria
attributes.background: In 1914, the British amalgalmate the Northern and Southern protectorate to become the country called, this is meant to be reviewed after 100 years this amalgamation is no more working. It is now expedient and necessary for this to be deamalgamate  by the amalgamator to save life.

rejection.details: Nigeria is an independent nation and decisions about its governance are a matter for the political institutions and people of Nigeria, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
